colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES DPAL GSANG BA'I BDAG PO'I BKA' SDON DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I BSRUNG MA MTHU RTZAL CAN DGRA LHA CHEN PO MCHED DGU'I GSOL MCHOD DGRA LAS RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, JING GIR GNAM GYI RIGS RGYUD STOBS 'BYOR MNGA' THANG GIS MNGON PAR MTHO ZHING, @010B BLA MA DKON MCHOG LA MI PHYED PA'I DAR GUS DANG LDAN PA THU SA LAG CHI HUNG THA'I JI TSE DBANG RDO RJE LEGS NAS, RGYAL BLON 'BANGS DU MA'I LHA GSOL GYI DON DU PHAN PA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS BSKUL MNAN CHER MDZAD PA LTAR, MKHAS GRUB DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO'I RGYAN DU 'DZIN PA'I RGYAL KHAMS PA ^BADZRA K'IRTIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I SLOB BU DGE TSUL BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PO'O,, ,,'DIS KYANG DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I LHA BSRUNG MTHU STOBS CAN RNAMS KYIS RTAG TU 'GO ZHING SDONG GROGS MDZAD DE BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN RGYA CHER THOGS SHING BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS PHYOGS KUN TU KHYAB PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG ,LHA RGYAL LO, ,)
